column4: SAP  Microsoft and Adobe announce data alliance
column5: FRANKFURT Business software companies SAP  Microsoft and Adobe said on Monday they were forming a data alliance that will make it easier for clients running their applications to get a better overview of the customer.

column4: SAP  Microsoft and Adobe announce data alliance
column5: FRANKFURT  Sept 24 Business software companies SAP  Microsoft and Adobe said on Monday they were forming a data alliance that will make it easier for clients running their applications to get a better overview of the customer.

column4: Tesla is making its own car carriers
column5: Sept 24 Tesla Inc is building its own car carriers  as the electric carmaker faces vehicle distribution problems.
